document_data.name: ''Moongate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moongates''''' were magically doorways that only operated under the glow of [[Selûne (moon)|Selûne's]] light.<ref name="PaP-p39" >
document_data.Notable Moongates: A ''moongate'' was believed to exist northeast of [[Leilon]] on the [[Sword Coast]] that provided access to the mystical shrine of [[Lurue]] called the [[Place of the Unicorn]].
